title: Rainbow Drive-In
seo_description: This order-at-the-counter spot for Hawaiian plate lunches is popular among locals and visitors alike. Plate lunches feature BBQ chicken, fried chicken, mahi mahi, chilidogs, loco moco, burgers & more local dishes.
contents_1: This order-at-the-counter spot for Hawaiian plate lunches is popular among locals and visitors alike.

address:
